name: Algebra Nation Dark Theme
description: Doing math for a long time when your assignment is due tomorrow is hard. Use this dark theme to make it easier on your eyes and easier to concentrate too.
additional_info:
Versioning System: A.B.C - A is release version. B is update version. C is public beta. All alpha and some beta testing will be done privately. If you want to see buggy elements before they get implemented, check out C updates. Otherwise, I would wait until B. 

0.0.1: Style created. No dark theme implemented.
0.1.0: Home page dark theme implemented. The Wall dark theme is in alpha stages.
0.1.1: The wall is pretty much done. 
1.0: The wait is over! Everything in the classic Algebra Nation has been dark themed. Notes: EdgeXL is not ready but nobody uses it so who cares. Test yourself is usable but not completely done. 1.1 will have EdgeXL and Test yourself improvements. After which, I will open up a contact form where you guys can message me about things that aren't dark themed.
